game.name: GONE Fishing
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: GONE Fishing은 친구들과 함께 낚시를 하며 살아남아야 하는 협동 멀티플레이 생존 공포 게임입니다. 살아남기 위한 유일한 방법은 호수의 끝없는 배고픔을 채우는 것입니다. 당신은 그 배고픔을 만족시킬 수 있을까요… 아니면 다음 제물이 될까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: GONE Fishing is a 1-8 player survival horror game where you and your friends must work together to stay alive, by fishing. The only way to survive is to keep feeding the lake’s insatiable hunger before it feeds on you. Can you satisfy the hunger... or will you become the next offering?

reviewHighlights.text: Fish, beer, gambling and moaning turtles. What more does a man need. (Please add cigarettes next update)
My friends and I love playing this game. I like to describe it as a combination of Lethal Company and Stardew Valley fishing but with way better graph...
